item.title: Agile Metrics tools
item.description: Agile metrics tools allows you to track metrics from different sources in order to identify trends and patterns on how your team performance is affected by its environment Inspired by ‘Agile Metrics in Action’ book and https://github.com/cwhd/measurementor project Pulls data from: Jira Jenkins Github Sonarqube Manual external sources And pushes it to ElasticSearch so that it can be further analyzed in order to find patterns. Inspired by Agile Metrics in Action book and https://github.
